name: Bingo's Biscuits
description:
Protect Bingo's biscuits from mice!

[CONTROLS]

  • Left & Right keys to move.
  • Space to start game/pause.
  • "R" to restart.
  • "M" to change mode.
  • "Z" to zoom in/out.

[CREDITS]

  • Art + Programming + Music by Julian Sanchez (Me)

[FONTS USED]

  • Commodore 64 font by Devin Cook
  • LCD font by Samuel Reynolds
